column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Wifey took me out on a date..when tribe
column2: smiff and wessun and camp low is in rotation in the dining room downstairs..I'm in heaven.great friendly staff and the food doesn't take a back seat to the incredible atmosphere..wow great night..and do yourself a favor and indulge in a cocktail or 2.bavette punch is fire...and the lions tail got me righteous
